UiTranslate
===========

``UiTranslate(x: number, y: number)``

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1
   :widths: 2 2 4

   * - Type
     - Argument
     - Description

   * - float
     - x
     - Point position at screen width

   * - float
     - y
     - Point position at screen height

Sets the current UI element position
